title: No Secrets
lyrics:
No telling secrets like we were drenched in blood
No telling secrets behind the door, like we were
No pageant dancing in the moonlight, lighting it up
Not a question of if they're gonna find that, they always do
No keeping secrets just like we were drenched in blood

No keeping secrets behind the door, unlike we were, unlike we were

Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, oh yeah



No telling secrets like we were all drenched in blood

No telling secrets behind the wall, like we were

Don't hide your dancing in the moonlight, light it up

Not a question of if they gonna find out, they always do



No keeping secrets just like we was all drenched in blood

No keeping secrets behind the wall, like we were, like we were

Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, oh yeah



No secrets

No secrets

No secrets
